{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$818.5K in 2021-2022** on contracts with SYNERSOLUTIONS TECHNOLOGIES.

Across 17 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 1 have at least one amendment (6%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 200% and the average number of amendments was 2. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$564.8K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.93 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$457.0K. The longest contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$2.1M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
